title: Countries A and B trade wheat and corn

content.question: A farmer in Country A can harvest 20 bushels of wheat or 10 bushels of corn in a day, while a farmer in Country B can harvest 8 bushels of wheat or 8 bushels of corn in a day. If Country A and Country B specialize and trade, Country A will

choices.label: benefit more from trade than will Country B

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
